集群命令
=====================

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_monitor:monitor
   :prog: hai-cli monitor
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_nodes:nodes
   :prog: hai-cli nodes
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_prof:prof
   :prog: hai-cli prof
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_validate:validate
   :prog: hai-cli validate
   :nested: full

.. click:: hfai.client.commands.hfai_version:version
   :prog: hai-cli version
   :nested: full
